titleStmt.title: The pathway to eternal life being the last sermon of that eminent divine Mr. T. Williams, B.D., lately deceased.
titleStmt.author: Williams, T., B.D.

notesStmt.note: Date of publication from Wing (2nd ed.).
Imperfect: tightly bound, and torn, with loss of text.
Reproduction of original in: Dr. Williams' Library (London, England).
